plot: Vice-President narrates a patriotic, propaganda short designed to boost morale in the the early days of World War II.
title: Paramount Victory Short No. T2-3: The Price of Victory
plot_es: Vice-President narrates a patriotic, propaganda short designed to boost morale in the the early days of World War II.
original_name: Paramount Victory Short No. T2-3: The Price of Victory
plot_en: Vice-President narrates a patriotic, propaganda short designed to boost morale in the the early days of World War II.
